data.message:
Eminem marshall or shady. whatever I have to tell you something: 
Thank you for being there for me, I'm a big fan and always will be. 
Many peoples hate me because I listened to you and I love, but my love for you is so big.
Not interested I wish you all the best, to lay down a lot of good songs and enjoy it.
I like your all songs and l dont have favorite song,all your song is favorite for me.
Man, today is your day.Happy Birthday.Greeting from Croatian. 
Always a big fan.
